Package ExponentialDistribution

Class ExponentialDistribution

java.lang.Object
ExponentialDistribution.ExponentialDistribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExponentialDistributionInterface
public class ExponentialDistribution extends Object implements ExponentialDistributionInterface
ExponentialDistribution.java This class models an exponential distribution, providing methods to interact with the distribution such as getting the mean, probability density function (PDF), cumulative distribution function (CDF), and generating random values. Created on 16/06/2023
Since:
1.0
See Also:
